<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get transactions by address"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v2/txs/{address}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get transactions associated with a given address across supported networks.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"address","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The address for which to fetch transactions.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"page","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Page number for pagination.","schema":{"type":"string","pattern":"^\\d+$"}},{"name":"pageSize","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of transactions to return per page (max 100).","schema":{"type":"string","pattern":"^\\d+$"}},{"name":"messageTypes","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Comma-separated list of message types to filter by.","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":["transfer","delegate"]}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A list of transactions for the given address.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"transactions":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"txHash":{"type":"string"},"blockHeight":{"type":"integer"},"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"messageType":{"type":"string","description":"The type of transaction message (e.g., \"transfer\", \"delegate\")."},"amount":{"type":"string","description":"Amount involved in the transaction."},"sender":{"type":"string"},"receiver":{"type":"string"}}}}},"required":["transactions"]}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request (invalid parameters)"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized (authentication failed)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
